name: Mousey
description:
is a 3D-platformer that pays homage to the beloved classics of the early 2000s.


In Mousey, you'll embark on an epic quest with a moveset that sets this game apart from the crowd!


Master the art of precision and land on the tiniest of points.


Unleash the sizzling power of the chili, transforming Mousey into an unstoppable force of nature that allows Mousey to zoom through the levels with lightning speed and have attacks that pack a punch like never before.



Enter Mousey's charming miniature world as you embark on a delightful indoor adventure. Traverse the house's nooks and crannies, discovering hidden surprises as you collect tasty pieces of cheese along the way. Unlock new cosmetics and uncover the power of the Chili Pepper.
